caption.p: Nodes, branches and volume of the vascular network visualized per CCi section in control and transgenic mice used to ablate Nkx2.1-derived or only NG2+ cells. The values (mean ± SEM) corresponding to the number of nodes, the number of branches and the volume of the vascular network per CCi section are given for: (1) Nkx2.1-cre+/Rosa-DTA mice and their corresponding control Nkx2.1-cre-/Rosa-DTA mice, and (2) Cspg4-cre+/Rosa-DTA mice and their corresponding control Cspg4-cre-/Rosa-DTA mice (n=4 each; unpaired Student’s t-test).

tr.th: Values (mean ± SEM) for the vascular network per CCi section
